title: "Get Collection Mods"
description: "Get all mods within a collection. Successful request will return a paginated list of [Mod Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/mod-object)."
sidebar_label: "Get Collection Mods"

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Collection Mods"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/collections/{collection-id}/mods"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all mods within a collection. Successful request will return a paginated list of [Mod Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/mod-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"_offset","in":"query","description":"Number of results to skip. Defaults to 0.","schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":0},{"name":"_limit","in":"query","description":"Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 100.","schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":100}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"required":false,"in":"query","name":"date_live","description":"Sort results by the date they went live using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/sorting) `date_live`. For example `_sort=-date_live` would return the most recently live games.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"required":false,"in":"query","name":"date_updated","description":"Sort results by the date they were last updated using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/sorting) `date_updated`. For example `_sort=-date_updated` would return the most recently updated games.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"required":false,"in":"query","name":"downloads_today","description":"Sort results by the number of mod downloads in the last 24hours using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/sorting) `downloads_today`. For example `_sort=-downloads_today` would return the most popular games from the last 24hours based on the number of mod downloads.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"required":false,"in":"query","name":"downloads_total","description":"Sort results by the total number of mod downloads using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/sorting) `downloads_total`. For example `_sort=-downloads_total` would return the most popular games based on the number of mod downloads.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"required":false,"in":"query","name":"subscribers_total","description":"Sort results by the total number of mod subscribers using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/sorting) `subscribers_total`. For example `_sort=-subscribers_total` would return the most popular games based on number of mod subscribers.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"required":false,"in":"query","name":"mods_count_total","description":"Sort results by the number of mods using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/sorting) `mods_count_total`. For example `_sort=-mods_count_total` would return the games with the most number of mods submitted.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>

score.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":91},"ratings_weighted_aggregate":{"description":"Overall rating of this item calculated using the [Wilson score confidence interval](https://www.evanmiller.org/how-not-to-sort-by-average-rating.html). This column is good to sort on, as it will order items based on number of ratings and will place items with many positive ratings above those with a higher score but fewer ratings.","type":"number","format":"float","example":87.38},"ratings_display_text":{"description":"Textual representation of the rating in format.","type":"string","enum":["Overwhelmingly Positive","Very Positive","Positive","Mostly Positive","Mixed","Negative","Mostly Negative","Very Negative","Overwhelmingly Negative","Unrated"],"example":"Very Positive"},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp until this mods's statistics are considered stale.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103}},"type":"object"},"skus":{"description":"SKUs with corresponding platforms that can be used to purchase the mod.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Mod SKU Object","properties":{"id":{"description":"The unique identifier for the SKU object.","type":"integer"},"sku":{"description":"The SKU for the mod at the given portal.","type":"string"},"portal":{"description":"The store (or platform) where the SKU is available.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}},"result_count":{"description":"Number of results returned in this request.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":70},"result_offset":{"description":"Number of results skipped over.
